original_text: For verily I say unto you, That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 많은 선지자와 의인이 너희가 보는 것들을 보고자 하여도 보지 못하였고 너희가 듣는 것들을 듣고자 하여도 듣지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: For verily I say unto you,
That many prophets and righteous men
have desired to see those things
which ye see, and have not seen them;
which ye hear, and have not heard them.
